Workshop

Hi! I’m Robert Williams and I run Workshop. It’s a service I started in November 2013 because I was a freelancer and wished I could hire someone to find me leads. I love chatting about consulting, design, and business so feel free to get in touch about guest posts, podcasts or any other fun opportunities.
